articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Virgin Orbit's first satellite launch from Western Europe fails after company reports 'anomaly' - ABC News
articles.description: The first attempt by Virgin Orbit to launch a satellite from Europe falls short after "anomaly".
articles.content:
The first attempt to launch a satellite from Western Europe has appeared to have failed after Virgin Orbit reported an "anomaly" that prevented its rocket from reaching orbit.

articles.description: UPDATE 4:55 p.m. A mission to launch the first satellites into orbit from Western Europe suffered an “anomaly” Tuesday, Virgin Orbit said.
articles.content:
UPDATE 4:55 p.m.
A mission to launch the first satellites into orbit from Western Europe suffered an “anomaly” Tuesday, Virgin Orbit said.
